overview:
Tony Carrozza brings more than 30 years of high technology sales and management experience to SGI, and is responsible for worldwide sales efforts for the company’s broad line of products and services.

Tony was Senior Vice President of Worldwide Sales for Quantum Corporation where he managed a 200 person sales and support organization that generated more than $800 million in revenues. While at Quantum Tony also served as VP of Worldwide Sales for the DLT Group and VP of Sales Strategy and Business Planning. He has also held management positions at Neterion Inc. and Iomega Corporation, and holds a B.A. from Iona College.
